episode.title: This Guy Reads a Lot Better
episode.rawTitle: 373: ‘This Guy Reads a Lot Better’, With Quinn Nelson
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Quinn Nelson joins the show to talk about Apple’s rumored AR/VR headset, Apple silicon, and more.
episode.showNotes:
